website_summaries.verdict: This is an attractive and functional knife at an affordable price.
pros: This handy little knife has a sharp stainless steel blade
The soft handle is easy to grasp, providing superior maneuverability and control
It also comes with a protective sheath that's useful for both travel and storage
And it comes in a range of bright colors
cons: This knife may not hold its edge as well as others

customer_reviews.title: They Rust!!!! I want my money back.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use, all the knives are rusting. How’s this product ranked so high and called “stainless steel”? Stainless is stainless, meaning doesn’t rust!!!! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Cut vegetables and fruits well. Rusts with first wash
customer_reviews.text: Having the blade covers is handy. Knives cut fruit and vegetables very well immediately after receipt of package. However after first wash of biggest knife, rust spots are visible on cutting edge. For those Interested, the product is manufactured in China.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: goodbye, old dull knives!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how dull my old knives were until I got these! I only got them because I lost a little paring knife I’d had forever, and desperately needed a little knife. The lost knife eventually showed up (of course), but by then I didn’t care, because these are so much nicer and sharper. The colors make it easy to find the right one. And the covers let me throw them into a draw and not worry about getting cut when I reach in for something else. And it’s so nice to slice things without a struggle!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying only Zyliss knives a while now. They are the perfect mediam between junky knives and high end knives. Everyone wants a sharp knife, but I can't bring myself to pay so much for them. The Zyliss knives have been great and they hold an adge pretty well. I think after a year I needed to sharpen them, but it's hard to beat these.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Almost unbelieveable knife set
customer_reviews.text: In sixty three years of marriage and cooking for three diabetic family members I have used many knife sets and knives. The Zyliss set I bought is the best I have ever used. Balanced and easy to maneuver. Am looking forward to slicing and diceing with this set. Even dishwasher safe, Good Housekeeping rates as one of the best brands. Nominal price. Thank you Amazon .
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Rusted immediately
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an existing set and while these looks the same, the metal is definitely different- THEY RUSTED ON THE FIRST WASH. The other set of these I have from 4 years ago still have no rust. I think these might be knock off and not from the actual company- this happens often on Amazon. They need to improve their quality control and stop allowing illegitimate sellers to sell counterfeit products. They lump all the ratings in for the same product- I’m giving these one star but the actual legitimate version deserves four or five.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Laing

customer_reviews.title: So Good Bought Them TWICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first set for less than $20 at a local chain store. They are amazing...I have Cutco knives and I hate them, no matter how often they are sharpened. These new knives actually CUT through food. I can thinly slice a tomato, onion, garlic. I have been watching them on Amazon and this set was on sale and I bought for my daughter who is a food snob and has raved about these knives when she is at our house and cooks. I can't wait to give them to her. And at this price, if they don't last forever, it isn't crazy to think about buying another set. We love these knives!
customer_reviews.author: alsatian5

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 2-3 days of use, ordered replacement, no rust yet after 1-2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sharp chef knife and I researched Amazon for it. This appeared to have some good comments and price was reasonable, so I placed my order. Unfortunately after 2-3 times using the knife I noticed some signs of rust on the sharp edge of the knife. But I wanted to give it a second chance, so I asked for a replacement. So far so good. After a couple dozen uses, no rust yet! I hope it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: It’s light and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I love 99% of this knife, actually it becomes our family “veggie” knife after we tried it. Here is why. My wife takes control of the kitchen, most gadgets should fit her (tiny) hand, this one is too big for her, and too small for me, but we like it. The color, the sharpness, and the weight. Since we do not need to cut too much vegetable, we decide to use it as the veggie dedicated one - low frequency usage, it works good.
customer_reviews.author: S.theMan

customer_reviews.title: Pieces of crap
customer_reviews.text: Will never suggest these to anyone. The large red knife had two divots in it in less than two weeks. They can’t even be sharpened out which made a third divot. They also rust along edge these definitely were not worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Gaeng

customer_reviews.title: Love the feeling of the handle and how well it cuts.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is more frustrating to me when cooking than a knife that is dull, and/or that is hard to maneuver. And bonus, this one feels fairly portable though is big enough I can halve an apple comfortably in one stroke. Time will tell how durable it is, and how well the edge keeps. But will good care I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: EternalStudent

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive knives
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive knives. Very sharp right out of the box. Bought these specifically because they come with covers. As a professional cook it's always handy to have a knife on hand just in case whenever on the line. These fit in my pocket and the covers stay on snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hui

customer_reviews.title: Cut myself the first day !!!
customer_reviews.text: These knives work great. I was used to using the dull knives i had been using for years and i was about to cut an avocado that was in my hand and decided to use one of my new knives . the knife was so sharp it went through the avocado pit through the avocado skin straight to the skin on my hand. They knives are LEGIT be careful i know i will be too
customer_reviews.author: VeryWendiful

customer_reviews.title: Sharp knives!
customer_reviews.text: Love these inexpensive knives for travel to other locations for cooking. They come VERY sharp, and can be easily resharpened. Don't put them in the dishwasher, wash them by hand and they will stay twice as sharp twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: JBurke

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED WITH THIS KNIFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife six years ago and it is seriously my FAVORITE knife. It stays sharp for so long before needing sharpened (I have only sharpened it a few times in six years) and it is the perfect size! I love to cook and spend a lot of time chopping veggies so a good knife is crucial. Zyliss is a fantastic brand as well. I just bought five more of these knives (four for Xmas gifts and one for myself as an extra.)
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin E. Oriti

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Quality or Dishwasher Safe
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and I hand washed. After use, I washed one in dishwasher as that’s the reason I chose these knives. The knife rusted badly even though my dishwasher is top of the line and the knife was alone in its spot on the rack. Another knife, the green one, the handle parts turned orange after using to cut watermelon. Very strange!
customer_reviews.author: D. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: These are not stainless steel - RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: The knives rust. They are not stainless steel. Terrible product. I can't even return them because I started using them months after I bought them. Thanks, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy serrated blade is not a great slicer.
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle, blade length, and price, BUT it definitely doesn't glide easily through vegetables. I tested it along with other serrated blades on multiple veggies like tomatoes and mushrooms and there is a lot more resistance in slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Inkling

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. These are the first knives I had ever found that are actually sharp and cut just about anything. Previous knives always were a big disappointment. The price is amazing. I had bought much more expensive knives in the past that didn't cut anything. Just a waste of money. Also love the different colors, and that each knife, even the smallest one, comes with its own sheath. Will recommend to all of my friends and relatives.
customer_reviews.author: bombaycat

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Zyliss knives are surprisingly sharp and have kept their edge for nearly 3 months without sharpening. I initially bought the 3 piece set and enjoyed them so much I bought this set when it went on sale. I am keeping this set as a backup if/when needed.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: These are a fantastic value if you don’t want to spend three to $400 on a professional set. They are well-built stay sharp and very comfortable. When I purchased them Amazon had a seven dollar discount which made it even better
customer_reviews.author: rdkmco

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blade, great size for cutting smaller items, for peeling or cutting most fruits and veggies. I wanted a knife just for that. I’ve only use them for a couple of weeks but so far the knives have stayed sharp and I’ve had no issues. For the price it’s definitely a goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great knives, better than some I've bought for 3-4X the price. I've been a fan of Zyliss for a while, too bad they're making things in China now too..
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: I love these knives, but....
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these knives in the past and have always loved them. Some of them have broken, as they are quite old, and I ordered this set as a replacement. I did not use all of the knives right away, and when I took one of them out of it's sheath the tip of the knife is bent, rendering it useless, and unfixable. By the time I got around to using this knife, it was past the date I was eligible to return it. I love the set, but am quite disappointed that I am unable to use one of the.
customer_reviews.author: Danika Watts

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small tomato knife years ago, and wore it out, so I was pleased to find this set with the same small knife included. These knives really are sharp and do a great job in preparing food.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Must have !!
customer_reviews.text: I love my knives .. I have difficulties with my hands due to my carpal tunnel and arthritis and hand weakness.. these are the best knives ever !! they cut very well.. Sharpen them at least every two months to keep them cutting smoothly!! I bought one for myself and one for my daughter .. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Jamaries Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great little set of knives!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set of knives. There are 2 paring-size knives, one with a straight edge and one with a serrated edge. Then there is a larger knife with a straight edge. They arrive very sharp and have stayed that way many months later. They each also come with a safety cover. I had a wood block of Henckels but gave them to away after purchasing this set because downsizing everything is my goal and this little set is all I need in the kitchen these days. This would also make a great gift for someone just setting up their first apartment.
customer_reviews.author: My2centsWorth

customer_reviews.title: Cut well but rust quickly
customer_reviews.text: The knives are very sharp and the grip feels well in the hand. The only con is that they get rust marks after 2 months which is uncommon for knives in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Feldman

customer_reviews.title: I find that my blade is still pretty sharp and the knife still works very well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this knife for ages (ordered it last year ago, actually). I find that my blade is still pretty sharp and the knife still works very well. However, I make sure to always wash my knife right after using it (for example, right after I make lunch) and then immediately drying the blade after washing. I put the cover back on the knife and put it away. I find this helps to sustain the life of the blade as well as keep it from rusting! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good, sharp (and cheap!) knife :) Has helped me out this past year of college apartment life.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Larke

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Sharp. Great quality knives.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knives as a gift for my aunt and she loved it. I have been using them for few years now and love the quality and sharpness of these knives. Chopping is easy and efficient with them ans they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: tracker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but work like more expensive knives! I've had them for years and I still love them! And they are still sharp after all this time. When I bought them my roommate was mad that they cut as well as his really expensive knives... The covers are also great! Because of the covers, you can store them safely in drawers or anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Toriy24

customer_reviews.title: The best knife I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These knives make cooking way easier and more fun with how easy it is to chop and dice my veggies and fruits up. I could not believe that I have been living my life using other dull knives. I am so happy I bought these and for such a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: izzydizzy

customer_reviews.title: sharp, versatile chef's knife with a tight fitting sheath
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife for my camp cooking set, which I use for about 5-6 trips per year. It is a sharp, versatile, chef's knife with a tight fitting sheath. Almost too tight – I would ditch that if it were my home knife. While I can't speak to how it holds up with daily use, it seems like a fine and reasonable knife for someone starting their kitchen or learning to cook. With all knives, you really have to take care to hand wash and dry – I do this immediately after use and haven't experienced rusting issues.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are excellent! Very sharp and comfortable handles. Amazing product for the price! I highly recommend! I received a set of three as a gift several years ago and ordered this set recently and am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling as well as daily use
customer_reviews.text: We use this traveling...just remember NOT to put it into your carry-on luggage; we had our original one confiscated by TSA so this is knife #2. I like the knife-guard so it does not mess up your other stuff when packed. Having a knife and paper plates when traveling is perfect for midnight snacks in the hotel room. Stays sharp, easy hand-grip.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grundy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Zyliss is my all time kitchen favorite brand for almost all my kitchen gadgets. A really great company that cares about their products I’m going to buy the salad spinner next
customer_reviews.author: bajalori

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight but robust and convenient to carry . Feels good in the hand. It’s well-built, razor-sharp and functional, perfect for everyday chores. I use it almost every day. I simply love the fact that it got here super fast...love it..
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Nealy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money...!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally blown away by the quality of these knives...!!!!! Who in the world would spend more money for the same result? Every kitchen needs this set of knives.
customer_reviews.author: WandaLovesMakeup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little knives
customer_reviews.text: Sick of dull knives and out of time to sharpen before the holidays, I ordered these on a whim. They exceeded all expectations. To say they are sharp is an understatement. We may have left the holidays with fewer fingers than we started, but nobody once complained about full knives!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite one
customer_reviews.text: I had this one for years until I lost them I was very happy to find the same exact model in Amazon. I have a tool to sharpen them after I use it for years because it is one of my favorites to cut meat, fruit and veggies. The lid keeps it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Carrasquer

customer_reviews.title: Good utility knife
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to replace an earlier version of the knife. Still find it easy to hold and the right size for a number of different cutting uses. The only thing I'm disappointed with is the blade does not seem as stiff as the previous version, so I am thinking of looking for another replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW what a knife
customer_reviews.text: This showed up as one of the best rated knives and I believe it. Super sharp and great sheath. I'll buy another if this one develops legs and leaves my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: max tanzen

customer_reviews.title: Rusts but Comfortable Handle
customer_reviews.text: It started rusting the first day. Handle is comfortable and gives you a good grip, important thing for a knife to do.
customer_reviews.author: Abt

customer_reviews.title: It suits my needs in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The knife seems sharp and cuts smoothly through onions, meats, and even a hard Rutabaga! I also used it to chop veggies such as carrots, peppers, celery and it performed well. For a tomato, it was easier to stab it first, then slice. I believe a tomato needs a serrated knife due to its inner softness. I believe the size of the knife is 7.5 inches instead of the listed 7.25,but it really did not matter to me. I like the hard plastic sheath that comes with it to prevent cuts and/or blade wear and tear. For the price, it was a decent purchase for me and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Southern CharmTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I liked the individual covers for each knife. I would like a container to set them in for the counter. Nice and sharp! Take good care of them-wash and dry after use.
customer_reviews.author: LInda Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable beginner chef knife
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a reasonable chefs knife for a beginner cook. It dulls fairly easily and I soon found myself using it for more knife "abusive" tasks. I believe this knife suits a beginners for their first several months of cooking, but past that point a higher quality knife should be acquired.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Rusted But Comfortable and Grippie Handle
customer_reviews.text: It rusted the first day, but handle is comfortable and gives good grip. I use it for cutting bread or tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Abt

customer_reviews.title: Sharp. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and well balanced Large enough to use as a steak knife
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: Never needs sharpening
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife...cuts bread and tomatoes and almost anything else that is within its size range. I can't understand why people pay so much more for expensive knives that always need sharpening!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Glick

customer_reviews.title: Whatta boggin! Punches way above its weight. It was better than Cats!
customer_reviews.text: At the price I paid, this knife is ridiculously good; I think all rating should be taken that way. It's not quite as heavy duty as my heretofore most-used chef's knife, but the very nice handle (grippy!) makes up for the lack of heft at least partly. the included blade cover is great, makes me feel much better about the fact that this knife lives in a drawer. For about a sawbuck? Fantastic value, and I think I'll get some more of these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: timothylord

customer_reviews.title: The utility knife for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the orange Zyliss knife for a few years which in my opinion was the best, but this purple one is also fantastic. It is larger and easily handles jobs like cutting meat or peeling pineapples.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Jacks

customer_reviews.title: It arrived extremely sharp and the weight was really good. She absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a beginners knife for my sister. I am an experienced home cook who has begun collecting high priced knife sets from both Japan and Germany. I was really impressed with this! It arrived extremely sharp and the weight was really good. She absolutely loves it! and the sheath cover allows her to feel like a warrior when she puts it in her belt loop. I don't see how you could get a better knife for this price. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Idem22

customer_reviews.title: Nice sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: You just don't know how bad your knives are until you buy a new one...This is sharp and cuts meat like a dream. Great quality and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Helen am I

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, will keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand, but I wanted more of a sharp serrated kitchen knife and was not overwhelmed with this blade for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: SocalDancer

customer_reviews.title: best knife
customer_reviews.text: my hands needed a lighter knife with great cutting ability and friends this is the one. Try it you will love it. The bonus is the knife cover keeps knife from getting banged around and safe getting out of the draw. Who could ask for more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Put your money into a better investment... Rusty Knife
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife and within a few months, rust started to show on the knife. I did not abuse this knife in any way... Spend more for a better, longer lasting investment. I only gave this 2/5 stars instead of 1/5 is because it was very sharp... be careful, I did cut myself a few times.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Knives are made to be sharpened, even Wusthof.
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great knife for the price charged ($13.99). It does not come to you razor sharp. You need to buy the KitchenIQ Two Stage knife sharpener.  Three strokes of the blade on the coarse slot and three stokes on the fine slot and the knife is sharp enough for practically any kitchen task. Never use a dull knife again. Ignore the whiners who gave this knife a bad review for not being sharp enough and buy the knife and the sharpener and you can't go wrong, A nice handling knife and a great sharpener and you are a beginning Paul Bocuse. Well...how about backyard BBQ wrangler?
customer_reviews.author: Abner Delacroix

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are very good knives. I have enjoyed them. I hand wash them so I have not experienced and issues with rust.
customer_reviews.author: Frugalshopper

customer_reviews.title: It's sharp, it's covered to protect its sharpness.
customer_reviews.text: It's sharp, it's covered to protect its sharpness. Nice knife, very handy. Use it for about everything in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJMB

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Extremely sharp 2. Versatile with the three types of knives 3. Colorful which makes it easy to select the one to be used 4. Comes with knife sheath for travel or safety 5. After six months of rigorous kitchen use and cleaning, still intact
customer_reviews.author: MOMMA CAR

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not terribly sharp, and a little heavier /larger than anticipated. Having said that, the price is right
customer_reviews.author: Trish Telesco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These knives are awesome, I had one for over a year now and wanted a couple more and they are really sharp and work great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. They are sharp and high quality for a pretty great price. I use mine for pretty much everything and they’ve held up beautifully over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: wrong dimensions
customer_reviews.text: the tip had a bend and the dimensions were wrong 4.75 x 13 x 0.75 in 4.75 x 13 x 0.75 in this is not this knife and they billed me again on 10/21/2017 for this crappy knife
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great knives at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These knives are fantastic. I did not realise how dull my old knives were until I started using the Zyliss knives. A bargain for sure.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting knives...
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives. Easy to cut and easy to clean. I don't put them in the dishwasher, hand washing keeps the handles from melting. Just saying ;)
customer_reviews.author: Coffeebean

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken tip
customer_reviews.text: They are not what I expected at all. Just looking into the package I can see the first/smallest knifes tip is broken off. Haven’t even unboxed them. Might return them and get something higher quality
customer_reviews.author: FLOWER..of..LIFE

customer_reviews.title: The cheap AP knife of yr dreams.
customer_reviews.text: This knife is the truth. I work at a heavy cocktail bar, my co-workers tried to give me grief over this amazon purchased $10 bar knife. Guess who straight up is like “yoooooo, that blade is great after multiple sharpenings”? Them, they are. Great knife, I use it at home as well, can’t stress it’s versatility based on its size. I’m buying it a 3rd time now. Not because the other ones have lost their shimmer, I just need a back up in case. A-GOSHDARN-PLUS.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Finn

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Zyliss makes great products and this was no exception. These were the 2nd and 3rd set I've purchased this year, with the first for the office, the second for home and the third one a gift. These are very reasonably priced and offer a great value. The blades are incredibly sharp and will make regular kitchen work much cleaner and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Argall

customer_reviews.title: Good for Sawing
customer_reviews.text: The serrated side is quite severe and pronounced for me to use as a paring knife. It must be handled with care. Ended up buying another knife with less serration.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Eisen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Affordable Knife Set for Your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is awesome! I recommend it as a housewarming or registry gift or to add to your kitchen. I love the price in comparison to how many knives you are getting. There are so many overpriced knife sets out there. Not this one! If you like pops of color, you will like this set even more. Overall great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carlin Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Car Camping.
customer_reviews.text: If you car camp, these are a must have. Maybe not for everyday use but they are essential for overnight, long weekend and other Car Camping outings. The sheaths make them easy to pack and intermix with other utensils like tongues and spatulas. We have used them to filet fish, eat steak and deal with a hobo that wouldn't give up his spot under a bridge. Again, the sheath allows for packing into a backpack or pocket for easy access while fishing, hiking or just getting a hobo to sing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Carolan

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the sheath. It is reasonably secure for camping. I expected sharpness so it's all OK
customer_reviews.author: Major Tom

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Get Out Of Case But Otherwise Great
customer_reviews.text: I just don't use case anymore as is really hard to get out...otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ahava

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheap Knife Set
customer_reviews.text: I had my first set of these for four years. When they got dull, I threw them out and bought another set. There is nothing special about these knives, they cut things and you really can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Good prep knife, convenient size, safe to pack
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife! It’s smaller, so it is convienient for taking in a cooler or food bag. I originally bought it for that reason... my kids spend all day at soccer tourneys and we sometimes eat near the fields. I was sick of only having plastic knives to work with. I’ve had it for years and just ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite knife! I love the ease of this knife. It’s my go to knife as I cook in my kitchen and I plan on buying more. It’s a great gift idea for anyone that loves to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knives, can't believe how good they are for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I got one of these knives to use temporarily before buying a full, high quality set. We liked the knife so much we ordered a full set, and these things are unbelievable for the money. We're no longer considering a premium knife set!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and sharp for seasonal work
customer_reviews.text: For the last few years, I buy a couple of these for summer veggie/ canning season. They are inexpensive ands very sharp for about 4 months
customer_reviews.author: tattoochik

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe knife
customer_reviews.text: Best tomato knife....but the last 2nd out of 3 knives was not quite as sharp as it should have been. Love them otherwise. 3/2019: Just bought two of these again...warning....dull and very dangerous while chopping an onion. Am returning the new ones and switching to another brand. Just can't count on them to be sharp. I've had a few that were and a few that weren't . So disappointing and Zyliss should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie A.

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite knife
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with all Zyliss knives. I have at least 5 of them. They are sharp and get the job done. The first ones I grab.
customer_reviews.author: Heartfelt

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous knife
customer_reviews.text: I forgot how wonderful it is to have a sharp knife in the kitchen. This gem makes all my vegetable chopping a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Wathen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these knives. I love the covers and colors only issue is that they rust a little (even without cover in use) but I don't mind. They're also very easy to sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packable
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect camping knife. We used to take one of our nice kitchen knives and roll it up in a towel and hope we don't stab ourselves. I did take the time to sharpen it. After that, perfect. A bit light for my taste, but so perfect for anytime you need to pack a knife.
customer_reviews.author: b083671

customer_reviews.title: sharp excellent cutting knife
customer_reviews.text: the knife cuts well very sharp and it comes with a case for safety I would definitely recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Helen Mac11

customer_reviews.title: Good basic chef's knife
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this (infrequently) for about 5 years. There are better chef's knives out there, but this is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding knife!
customer_reviews.text: The Zyliss Serrated Paring Knife is one of the best knives that I have ever owned. It is incredibly sharp and is truly a do every thing knife. At four inches it is large enough to do jobs that your three inch knives can't handle. It will even cut bread. The grip surfaces on the handle are in the perfect places, especially on top for the thumb. The sheath fits good and tight and is a great plus. For eight dollars this is an outstanding deal. What can I say but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kirkman

customer_reviews.title: This is a good knife so far
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp! This is a good knife so far. I wanted a sharp knife for chopping and this one is that. I'm still learning to use it. I don't know how long the sharpness will last but it's doing the job for now. It is larger than I expected. The handle is substantial.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Sharp but...
customer_reviews.text: Sharp knives but the smallest ones tip broke off already. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a must bring for every camping event. So dang sharp. Anyone that borrows my knife at camp always says "This is a sharp knife". The sheath is an awesome bonus. I only buy Zyliss knives now. Lasts long, very sharp, and comes with a sheath. This is all I can ask for a knife. :) Oh yeah, six people borrowed my knives so far. Two cut themselves misjudging how sharp the knife was.
customer_reviews.author: Mondo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. They’re sharp enough out of the box to cut tomatoes and hold an edge very well. Update the green one started rusting a bit but im pretty sure i put it away wet still. They hold and edge very well the black one having cut up over 100lbs of pork.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: No dishwasher keep clean and dry. As with any set of knives used in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 13 year old granddaughter who loves to help in the kitchen. We picked out her favorites, she loves using them and enjoys making meals with her own knives. Wash immediately dry immediately and they will stay perfect. Very happy with her first professional knife st.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Fronzoni

customer_reviews.title: An excellent tomato knife
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this especially to slice tomatoes and it works very well on those. Not thrilled with the handle but for the price, can't complain too much. It does work on bread but the short blade isn't made for larger loaves. The blade cover makes this a good choice when I need to carry a knife to cut salad mixings for office lunches. Edited March 2, 2014: Found this item packaged with a similar knife at TJ Maxx for less than $5. Just sayin'. Look around, still a decent product but it can be bought for less.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp out of the package
customer_reviews.text: I got this knife to put in the camping box. I haven't used it yet but wanted to initially report that it comes really sharp out of the package. We'll see how long it stays that way though. Five star rating because I have no reasons to ding it as of now. I'll come back and update when I know more.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cut very well -
customer_reviews.text: OK .. pros first. It came with a very nice sheath/case. Now a very BIG con ... IT DOESN'T CUT VERY WELL. I was kind of shocked that a brand new knife, would cut so poorly. I received a free paring knife at our local Sam's Club during a product demo. That free knife cuts so much better than this one. I guess another pro would be that it didn't cost much. The price was low enough that I'll keep it for a spare, it isn't worth going through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: DabuckTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blade and grip
customer_reviews.text: An excellent knife, especially for the price. Perfect for the typical, everyday home cook. I can't imagine what a better knife would be, unless you prefer other colors. I bought three different knives by Zyliss, but this the most practical of all and would be the best option if you intend on buying just one knife.
customer_reviews.author: bped82

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knife
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, very sharp, hasn't gone dull in 2 years of regular use. This knife is significantly sharper that the equivalent that you'd buy at target or find in a standard knife set. It immediately became the knife I use for everything (except bread).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very good general-purpose knife for the price. Sharp enough to cut through tomatoes smoothly. To those complaining about rust - all knives begin to rust sooner or later. Try soaking in a solution of lemon juice or apple cider vinegar or try cleaning with a baking soda paste. Afterwards, coat with a drop of olive or clove oil to prevent further rust.
customer_reviews.author: Arno Parke

customer_reviews.title: Handy little knife.
customer_reviews.text: This little knife is the best. It cuts well and cleans up easily. The case makes it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Majors

customer_reviews.title: Not a sharp a knife
customer_reviews.text: Not sharp as expected. For the first week it worked well and in the next week I struggled in cutting the onion too. If we have knife sharpener then it well worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Anitha Doniparthi

product_meta.title: ZYLISS Serrated Paring Knife, 3 3/4-Inch Stainless Steel Blade, Red
product_meta.description: Style:4" Serrated Paring KnifeFor fine blade work, such as dicing tomatoes or paring fruit, the Zyliss Paring Knife is the go-to paring knife of choice. Soft skinned produce from tomatoes to stone fruit can get a clean cut with this state-of-art, top-grade knife. Serrated blade can slice through tougher-skinned foods like salami with ease. Constructed of superior quality Japanese steel and anchored by a soft touch, comfort-grip handle. Maximize your precision and control with the Zyliss Paring Knife.
feature_bullets: Serrated paring knife perfectly controls cutting and slicing of tomatoes, breads and vegetables
High-carbon stainless steel blade retains super sharp edge and easily re-sharpens for long lasting use
Ergonomic handle with soft touch rubber grip, reduces hand fatigue and allows for precision and control
Safety blade guard protects knife for travel and storage when camping or tailgating
5 Year Zyliss Guarantee, Dishwasher Safe - Handwash Recommended
